title: City snapshot: Diageo sells wine portfolio to Treasury Wine Estates
text:
14 Oct 2015 | By Alec Mattinson 
Diageo has agreed sale of its major wine interests to Australiaâ€™s Treasury Wine Estates for $552m, plus SABMiller shares soar on ABInBev deal agreement and all the rest of the news from the City. Available to members only
